# NSTabViewDelegate

**Protocol**

The `NSTabViewDelegate` protocol defines the optional methods implemented by delegates of `NSTabView` objects.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol NSTabViewDelegate : NSObjectProtocol
```

## Adding and Removing Tabs

- **tabViewDidChangeNumberOfTabViewItems(_:)**: Informs the delegate that the number of tab view items in `tabView` has changed.

## Selecting a Tab

- **tabView(_:shouldSelect:)**: Invoked just before `tabViewItem` in `tabView` is selected.
- **tabView(_:willSelect:)**: Informs the delegate that `tabView` is about to select `tabViewItem`.
- **tabView(_:didSelect:)**: Informs the delegate that `tabView` has selected `tabViewItem`.

## Handling the Selection of Tabs

- **delegate**: The tab view’s delegate.

## Inherits From

- NSObjectProtocol

## Conforming Types

- NSTabViewController

items.description: Informs the delegate that the number of tab view items in `tabView` has changed.
items.name: tabViewDidChangeNumberOfTabViewItems(_:)

items.description: Invoked just before `tabViewItem` in `tabView` is selected.
items.name: tabView(_:shouldSelect:)

items.description: Informs the delegate that `tabView` is about to select `tabViewItem`.
items.name: tabView(_:willSelect:)

items.description: Informs the delegate that `tabView` has selected `tabViewItem`.
